Name: Helping the Hotties
About the game: In Helping the Hotties , you are a college student madly in love with your girlfriend, but instead of spending the summer with her, you receive an unexpected phone call. The next day, you’re on a bus going to work in a boy's educational and behavioral rehabilitation camp. But, to your surprise, it’s not a boy's camp anymore… Who are these girls? Why are they here? What will you do? You still love your girlfriend, right? Lead a group of four beautiful participants through their journey of improvement and reestablishment in society while trying to remain as professional as possible... and maintain a long-distance relationship. Are you up for the task? Other gameplay features: Exciting images and animations: More than 10000 images and more than 300 animations to boost your imagination A rattling story: Packed with humor and mysteries, and a little bit of love! A story to be continued: Currently, 7 episodes are out, and we’re not done here…
